about.name: Mike De Decker
about.info: I enjoy building (web)applications, working with data and machine learning models. The past months I especially enjoyed creating a AI judge assistant which recognizes jump rope skills from video footage.

works.title: TNC25 Future Talent Program
works.description: In june 2025 I've been selected to present my AI judge assistant in a Lightning Talk for the GEANT community.
